name: ParagonsDAO
intro: Building the future around P2E gaming
introduce: ParagonsDAO aims to add value to Parallel, helping them gain user base growth via strategic partnerships within the NFT and DeFi communities. Harnessing the PDT token, holders control DAO-held assets (Masterpieces, Catalyst Drives, Prime Keys, etc.) while collectively participating in governance and growth by hosting tournaments, sponsoring players, creating content and anything else decided by the DAO.
